Uses of Package
org.waarp.common.crypto

  • Packages that use org.waarp.common.crypto 
    Package Description
    org.waarp.common.crypto
    Classes implementing Encryption for Password support or for File Encryption AES is the best compromise in term of security and efficiency.
    org.waarp.gateway.ftp.config
    Exec configuration.
    org.waarp.gateway.kernel.rest  
    org.waarp.gateway.kernel.rest.client
    Package for REST Http client support
    org.waarp.openr66.protocol.configuration
    Class implementing Configuration
    org.waarp.openr66.protocol.http.restv2.resthandlers
    This package regroups all the general purpose Netty ChannelHandlers of the REST API.
  • Classes in org.waarp.common.crypto used by org.waarp.common.crypto 
    Class and Description
    DesManager
    This class implements a simple Key Manager for DES class from name
    DynamicKeyObject.INSTANCES
    Minimal key size
    DynamicKeyObject.INSTANCESMAX
    Recommended key size when normal JVM installed (no extension on encrypt support)
    KeyManager
    This class implements a simple Key Manager from name
    KeyObject
    This class handles method to crypt and decrypt using the chosen algorithm.
  • Classes in org.waarp.common.crypto used by org.waarp.gateway.ftp.config 
    Class and Description
    Des
    This class handles methods to crypt and decrypt messages with DES algorithm (very efficient: 40000/s).
  • Classes in org.waarp.common.crypto used by org.waarp.gateway.kernel.rest 
    Class and Description
    HmacSha256
    This class handles methods to crypt (not decrypt) messages with HmacSha256 algorithm (very efficient: 105000/s).
  • Classes in org.waarp.common.crypto used by org.waarp.gateway.kernel.rest.client 
    Class and Description
    HmacSha256
    This class handles methods to crypt (not decrypt) messages with HmacSha256 algorithm (very efficient: 105000/s).
  • Classes in org.waarp.common.crypto used by org.waarp.openr66.protocol.configuration 
    Class and Description
    Des
    This class handles methods to crypt and decrypt messages with DES algorithm (very efficient: 40000/s).
  • Classes in org.waarp.common.crypto used by org.waarp.openr66.protocol.http.restv2.resthandlers 
    Class and Description
    HmacSha256
    This class handles methods to crypt (not decrypt) messages with HmacSha256 algorithm (very efficient: 105000/s).
